MARGARET ERRICHETTI v. CHRISTOPHER ERRICHETTI *912SULLIVAN, C. J., and VERTEFEUILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition. Lori Welch-Rubin, in support of the petition. Kenneth J. Bartschi and Wesley W. Horton, in opposition. Decided June 17, 2003

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
